name: ExtremeJobs Knight’s Assistant VIP
description:
VIP Edition Sepcial Benefit.
300 Fairystones + 100 Timestones + 100 Summon-Runes.
Present items worth 5 USD.

Effortless control! An unusual tension! A warrior out on an adventure needs a capable manager! B-humor, quick growth, lots and lots of collectibles, tons of items and equipment crafting! It's everything that you you'd want in a stand-alone idle game

Game Features
-Compete with people around the world with ranking.
-You can develop even more quickly with summoners.
-Take cute pets with you on adventures.
-Collect an endless variety of accessories.
-Take on the extreme challenge mode.

Notice
-This app has in-app items for purchase.
-This app contains ads.
